changes.title: Multi-Step Registration Form with Modern Design
changes.description: Transformed registration page into a beautiful 3-step multi-stepper form inspired by Vuexy admin template
details: Replaced long single-page form with 3-step wizard: Account Type, Personal Info, Address Details
Added visual step indicators with icons and progress tracking
Implemented Previous/Next navigation buttons for better UX
Applied purple gradient theme (linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%))
Created split-screen design with branding/stats on left side
Added step-by-step validation to catch errors early
Enhanced input fields with focus effects and modern styling
Improved form layout with better spacing and typography
Added smooth transitions and hover animations
Responsive design adapts to mobile and desktop screens
changes.impact: Significantly improved registration experience - less overwhelming, more intuitive, and visually appealing. Reduces form abandonment and increases successful registrations.

changes.title: Voucher Unassign Feature - Return Funds to Wallet
changes.description: Added ability for VCSE and School users to unassign active vouchers and return funds to their wallet
details: Added 'Unassign' button (❌) next to 'Reassign' button in Voucher Orders
Unassign button only appears for active vouchers
Confirmation dialog warns user about consequences before unassigning
Backend API endpoint /api/voucher/unassign created
Funds automatically returned to organization wallet upon unassignment
Voucher status changed to 'cancelled' with reason tracked
Wallet transaction created with type 'credit' for audit trail
Permission checks ensure only voucher issuer can unassign
changes.impact: Organizations can now recall vouchers from recipients and recover funds, providing flexibility in voucher management and budget control

changes.title: Fund Loading Restricted to Admin Only
changes.description: Removed direct fund loading capability from VCSE and School dashboards - only Admin can add funds to organization wallets
details: Removed 'Load Funds' tab from VCSE mobile navigation
Removed PaymentTab component rendering from VCSE and School dashboards
Replaced payment form in School wallet with admin-only notice
Added informational message explaining admin-only fund allocation
Added instructions on how to request funds from administrator
Organizations can still view wallet balance and transaction history
Payment processing now centralized through admin for better financial control
changes.impact: Improved financial security and control - all fund allocations now require admin approval, preventing unauthorized fund loading

changes.title: LoginPage Duplicate Links Removal
changes.description: Removed duplicate 'Forgot Password' and 'Back to Home' links at bottom of LoginPage
details: Removed duplicate 'Forgot Password?' link at bottom (kept button version above)
Removed duplicate 'Back to Home' link at bottom (kept button version above)
Kept only 'Sign Up' link at bottom for cleaner design
Improved visual hierarchy and reduced clutter
Maintained all functionality with button versions above sign-in form
changes.impact: Cleaner, less cluttered login page with better user experience and no duplicate navigation options

changes.title: Notification System - Text Visibility, Badge Display, and API URLs
changes.description: Fixed critical notification system issues preventing users from viewing notifications
details: Fixed incorrect API URLs preventing notifications from loading (/notifications/* → /api/notifications/*)
Changed notification message color from #333 to #000 (black) for better readability
Changed subtitle/metadata color from #666 to #555 (darker gray)
Enhanced notification badge: brighter red (#ff0000), white border, box shadow, increased size to 22px
Added dynamic width for '9+' display on badge
Fixed empty notification panel issue - notifications now load from database correctly
changes.impact: All user types (Admin, VCSE, Recipient, School) can now properly view and manage notifications
